title: ED conducts searches on premises of Religare's Rashmi Saluja, other officials
description: The Enforcement Directorate conducted searches at multiple premises linked to senior officials of Religare Enterprises, seizing documents related to allegations of fund siphoning from Religare Finvest. The investigation stems from a complaint alleging financial misconduct by former promoters and current officials. This has led to further scrutiny, including summoning Dabur India chairman.
